plot outline: Manada Mareyalli movie story is based on the memory of mind hundreds of situations in life. Srikanth of 'Olave Mandhara' super hit film is the lead hero of the film. Kannada speaking heroine Vindya who is the daughter of blind couple is the lead heroine of the film.The shooting of this film will be held in Bangalore, Madikeri.
title: Manada Mareyalli
plot: _Manada Mareyalli_ (qv) movie story is based on the memory of mind hundreds of situations in life. Srikanth of 'Olave Mandhara' super hit film is the lead hero of the film. Kannada speaking heroine Vindya who is the daughter of blind couple is the lead heroine of the film.The shooting of this film will be held in Bangalore, Madikeri.
